Your uncle, the illustrious Gount Alessandro, who in these last days returned, after the spirit, to the heavenly fatherland whence he came, was my Lord, and his memor-y will have dominion over me so long as my life shall last in this world; for his nobility of soul‚ which now is richly recompensed with meet rewards beyond the stars, for long years past, as he willed, made me his servant. And verily this quality, accompanied as it was in him by all the other virtues, caused his name to stand out, as it were in bronze, above the fame of other Italians. And what else did his heroic escutcheon proclaim‚ but- that ‘ we display the scourge that drives away vice’ ‘? for as
